name: Battle Groove
description:
Send waves to destroy the enemy core.

Capture checkpoints to increase your groove income.

The unit waves are powered by the music sound waves.

Two game modes:

  • Player vs AI: you control the blue core.
  • Local multiplayer: two players play using the same keyboard.

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2017 in 48 hours. Check the jam version at http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/battle-groove

Credits:

  • Jesús González: programming.
  • Elias Mascheroni: programming.
  • Francisco Tabakman: 3D modelling and animation.

Music from audionautix.com and incompetech.com.
